text: Abu Abdullah Muhammad ibn Ismail (Arabic: أبو عبد الله محمد بن إسماعيل الرابع), also known as Muhammad IV (14 April 1315 – 25 August 1333), was the ruler of the Emirate of Granada on the Iberian Peninsula from 1325 to 1333. == Death == Muhammad was killed on 25 August 1333 (13 Dhu al-Hijja 733 AH) near the mouth of the Guadiaro. Abu Abdullah Muhammad ibn Ismail was born in the city of Granada on 14 April 1315 (7 Muharram 715 AH). ==References== Category:1315 births Category:1333 deaths Category:Monarchs Category:People from Granada
title: Muhammad IV of Granada
